matrix.vui
Class ButtonBorder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
        |
        +--java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
              |
              +--java.awt.Rectangle
                    |
                    +--matrix.vui.ButtonBorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable, java.awt.Shape
public class ButtonBorder
extends java.awt.Rectangle

A class representing a border that looks like a push button. Primarily used for toolbar buttons that contain an image.

See Also:
Serialized Form
